response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which holds immense value for us due to its unique features and capabilities. Given its importance to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it a great opportunity for you. We believe this investment would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 12000}
